title: Warm mushroom salad with pancetta
ingredients: ['8 rashers pancetta', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '12 shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '15 crimini mushrooms, sliced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '15 kalamata olives, pitted and halved', '2 tablespoons capers', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '60g fresh spinach, stems removed', '40g rocket', '75g crumbled feta cheese', 'ground black pepper to taste']
